backend/main.mo: Actor implementing access-controlled user profile storage plus types for dates, payments, monetary events, travel entries, and travellers, with backup import/export and profile merge logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to their corresponding source files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global frontend styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component handling authentication, profile setup gating, and rendering the ledger page with theming and toasts.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header displaying the app title and a user dropdown with principal info and logout support.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Authentication gate that shows a login screen when unauthenticated and renders children once logged in.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Generic empty-state component showing an icon or illustration, text, and an optional action button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal shown to new users prompting them to enter and save their name before accessing the app.
frontend/src/components/ResponsiveTableS: Scrollable wrapper for tables that provides horizontal scrolling via a scroll area component.
frontend/src/features/ledger/BackupResto: Handles exporting local and backend ledger data to a backup file and restoring from uploaded backups with confirmation for draft conflicts.
frontend/src/features/ledger/CarExpenses: Manages adding car expenses, validating inputs, listing totals by category, and displaying expenses within the selected date range.
frontend/src/features/ledger/CashPayment: Provides a dialog form for recording cash payments for a traveller with validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/features/ledger/ClearDataPa: Implements a password‑protected interface to clear various categories of ledger data with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DailyPartic: Displays and edits daily AM/PM trip participation for travellers, supports bulk actions, weekend inclusion, and saving draft data.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DateRangePi: Lets users pick start and end dates for the ledger using popover calendar controls.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DeleteCarEx: Shows a confirmation dialog for deleting a car expense and triggers deletion with a success toast.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DeleteCashP: Confirmation dialog for deleting a cash payment and showing a success toast upon deletion.
frontend/src/features/ledger/EditCarExpe: Dialog for editing a car expense with form validation and updates to the ledger state.
frontend/src/features/ledger/EditCashPay: Dialog allowing users to edit a traveller’s cash payment with basic validation and update handling.
frontend/src/features/ledger/ExpenseHist: Dialog wrapper that opens the expense history view in a scrollable modal.
Displays a filterable and searchable list of car expenses with edit and delete controls.
frontend/src/features/ledger/ExportButto: Button that triggers the export report dialog.
frontend/src/features/ledger/ExportRepor: Configurable export dialog allowing users to choose format, filters, and travellers before generating a report.
Main ledger page assembling date controls, history dialogs, export, and tabbed navigation across all ledger features.
frontend/src/features/ledger/LedgerState: Provides a React context and provider exposing all ledger state and mutation functions from useLedgerLocalState.
frontend/src/features/ledger/OtherPendin: Dialog form allowing users to add a new 'other pending' amount for a traveller with validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/features/ledger/OverallSumm: Computes and displays overall income, expenses, and monthly breakdowns based on daily data and car expenses within a date range.
frontend/src/features/ledger/PaymentHist: Opens a dialog containing the payment history view for cash payments within the selected date range.
Displays a filterable, sortable table of cash payments with edit and delete actions.
frontend/src/features/ledger/RatePerTrip: Input control for viewing and updating the rate charged per trip with basic validation.
frontend/src/features/ledger/SummaryPane: Generates per-traveller trip counts, charges, payments, pending amounts, and balances for the selected date range.
frontend/src/features/ledger/TravellerMa: UI component to add, edit, and remove travellers, blocking deletion if balance is nonzero.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useLedgerLocalState.t: Manages local ledger state with persistence, including travellers, trips, payments, expenses, and date range.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend calls for user profiles and backup import/export.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light/dark modes with custom palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/utils/backupRestore.ts: Utilities to export, import, and merge ledger backup data between local and backend states.
frontend/src/utils/dateRange.ts: Helpers for generating date ranges and formatting date keys and display strings.
frontend/src/utils/exportExcel.ts: Generates CSV exports for daily trip grids and traveller summaries, including counts, charges, and payments. Handles CSV formatting and triggers file downloads.
frontend/src/utils/exportReport.ts: Creates configurable CSV reports with daily grids, summaries, payments, car expenses, and overall totals. Supports filtering travellers and optional sections.
frontend/src/utils/ledgerBalances.ts: Computes a traveller’s balance by calculating trips, charges, payments, and other pending amounts within a date range. Respects weekend inclusion rules.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Formats numbers as INR currency and parses currency strings into numeric values.
frontend/src/utils/tripCalculations.ts: Calculates income totals and monthly income breakdowns from daily trip data while honoring weekend inclusion settings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL query params, persist them in sessionStorage, and clean parameters from URL hashes.
frontend/src/utils/weekendInclusion.ts: Determines whether dates fall on weekends and whether they should be included or editable based on configuration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining themes, colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Defines project requirements for adding a Backup & Restore feature that exports all stored data as JSON and restores by merging imported JSON. Lists existing features, new requests, and architectural notes for implementing deterministic merge behavior.
